feed.title: Who's Of First
feed.subtitle: Who's On First is a gazetter of all the places.

entry.title: Proposed change to the Who's On First data license
entry.content: Who’s On First is becoming a Linux Foundation project and proposes to change to the Community Data License Agreement – Permissive, Version 1.0 data license

entry.title: Three Steps Backwards, One Step Forwards; a Tale of Data Consistency and JSON Schema
entry.content: Learning to use [JSON Schema] by reading its specification is like learning to drive a car by looking at its blueprints.

entry.title: The Why of the How
entry.content: One of the things I've taken to saying in recent years is that sometimes we make mistakes because of circumstance and sometimes we make bad decisions because of reasons... so please just write those reasons down somewhere.

entry.title: WOF in a Box (part 3)
entry.content: The Spelunker was rebuilt on a bare Ubuntu 16.04 Linux server, following Dan’s WOF in a Box instructions and everything worked without a hitch. Along the way, I made some updates to the “fetching and indexing data” piece specifically to make things faster and easier for people who just want to work with the data as-is and don’t need to make updates.

entry.title: Privatezen
entry.content: The first week I started at Mapzen, in 2015, I remembering thinking I wonder if I can swap out each one of third-party services used by Privatesquare with an equivalent Mapzen service? The answer, at the time, was “No”. It was a useful reminder of the work we had set out for ourselves.

entry.title: Who's On First, Chapter Two
entry.content: It means that while things are not literally "better than yesterday" – since yesterday you didn't have to read this blog post – it means that things are hopefully better than the yesterday of the last time a service you came to depend on had to shutter its doors.

entry.title: WOF in a Box (part 2)
entry.content: Run Who's On First on your own hardware.

entry.content: Outlining a few one-offs, changes, and edits that were made to Who's On First in 2017
